sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Title from './components/Title'; import Control from './components/Control'; import List from './components/List'; class App extends Component { render() { return (
{/* TITLE : START */} {/* TITLE : END */} <div className="row"> <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12"> <div class="col-xs-3 col-sm-3 col-md-3 col-lg-3"> <button type="button" className="btn btn-large btn-block btn-success">Add Task</button> </div> <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-md-6 col-lg-6"> <input type="text" className="form-control" placeholder="Task Name"></input> </div> <div class="col-xs-3 col-sm-3 col-md-3 col-lg-3"> <button type="button" class="btn btn-success">Submit</button> <button type="button" class="btn btn-danger">Cancel</button> </div> </div> <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12"> <input type="text" className="form-control" placeholder="Filter"></input> </div> </div> <div className="panel panel-success"> <div className="panel-heading"> <h3 className="panel-title">List Task</h3> </div> <table className="table table-hover"> <thead> <tr> <th>#</th> <th>Task</th> <th>Action</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>1</td> <td>Học HTML</td> <td> <button type="button" className="btn btn-primary">Sửa</button> <button type="button" className="btn btn-danger">Xóa</button> </td> </tr> <tr> <td>2</td> <td>Học CSS</td> <td> <button type="button" className="btn btn-primary">Sửa</button> <button type="button" className="btn btn-danger">Xóa</button> </td> </tr> <tr> <td>3</td> <td>Học JS</td> <td> <button type="button" className="btn btn-primary">Sửa</button> <button type="button" className="btn btn-danger">Xóa</button> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> </div> </div> ); } } export default App;
